name: Spring Fever
description:
Overview

The spring season has arrived. Stay cool by making your way towards snow clouds and by all means necessary, don't melt! Spring Fever is a short, but sweet top-down puzzle game that was created for the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam in under 5 days.

Other than the music, fonts, and some sound effects, I created everything in the game during the timeframe of the jam.

Game Jam Theme: "What is hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw."
